DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : The objective compare low level laser therapy ( LLLT ) therapy versus low LLLT therapy combination exercise exercise pain , range motion ( ROM ) , functionality , activity limitation patient subacromial impact syndrome . Design : Randomized placebo-controlled clinical trial . Setting : The setting study Municipal Clinic Barueri , SÃ£o Paulo , Brazil . Participants : 60 patient subacromial impact syndrome randomly assign three group . Interventions : Group I , experimental ( n=21 ) treat low level laser therapy exercise ; Group II , experimental ( n=21 ) treat exercise ; Group III , experimental ( n=18 ) treat low level laser therapy . Laser use GaAs ( 904 nm , 60 mW ) , continuous emission . The participant receive application laser three time week eight week , 9 shoulder point ( 3 Joules/point ) per session . Main outcome measure : Visual Analogic Scale ( VAS ) score , Shoulder Pain Disability Index ( SPADI ) , goniometer , Modified-University California Los Angeles Shoulder Rating Scale ( UCLA ) , record treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Low Level Laser Therapy Associated With Exercise Subacromial Impingement Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: In group receive low level laser therapy ( LLLT ) , energy irradiate three insertion point supraspinatus muscle region , three point bursa subacromial , three point along bicipital groove , 3 Joules per point . Total dose per shoulder 27 Joules per treatment , use previously calibrate Irradia Class 3B ( Stockholm , Sweden ) . Pen 's semiconductor consist gallium arsenide wavelength 904 nm , frequency 700 Hz , average potency 60 mW , peak potency 20 W , pulse duration 4.3 m , 50 second per point ( 0.5cm2 area ) . The parameter follow recommendation World Association Laser Therapy subacromial impact syndrome . The participant receive application laser three time week eight week . The group treat exercise follow training program . Isotonic strengthen exercise perform scapular pivot , scapula stabilizer , humeral propellant muscle group . Three set 15 repetition isotonic strengthen exercise perform . The isometric exercise perform ten set ten second . Analytical stretch muscle group perform begin session 30 second . The participant perform exercise three time week eight week .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis subacromial impact syndrome Age range : 3075 year Both gender cancer , diabetes , symptomatic shoulder osteoarthritis , surgery previous fracture humeral head shoulder , history acute trauma , calcification articular rotator tendon , total tendon rupture , cervical myofascial syndrome , radicular pain , inflammatory rheumatic disease , neurological disorder , depressive syndrome use antidepressant , use antiinflammatory medication use anxiolytic
